rooms.name: Starting Chamber
rooms.description: A gentle glow fills the room and a friendly sprite waves you forward.

rooms.name: Quiet Hall
rooms.description: Dusty stones and faded murals cover the walls. It is eerily quiet.

rooms.name: Treasure Alcove
rooms.description: A sparkling chest rests on a pedestal. Enchanted vines curl around it.

rooms.name: Beast Lair
rooms.description: Scratch marks gouge the stone. Something hungry is close by.

rooms.name: Puzzle Nook
rooms.description: glowing runes shimmer above a stone plinth, inviting a clever mind.

rooms.name: Fountain of Stories
rooms.description: A fountain whispers tales of heroes. Drinking here might restore hope.
